name: Caviar
description:
A Fish Photography Game

Dive into an immersive underwater world with your Polaroid camera, capturing stunning fish and growing the ecosystem with each snapshot. Explore this short, whimsical sandbox experience as you bring life to the depths beneath the waves.



Features
  • 8+ Fish Variants.
  • 15+ Minutes of playtime.
  • Your polaroid's saves onto your computer :
    ->Users->[UserName]->AppData->LocalLow->defaultcompany->Caviar.
  • Befriend the Manatee.
